ingredients.ingredient: 2 (10 ounce) boxes frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
3 (2.1 ounce) packages pre-baked mini phyllo dough shells

cookingTips: Squeeze spinach extremely dry in a kitchen towel to remove excess moisture and prevent soggy cups
Mix filling ingredients at room temperature for easier handling and even distribution
Fill cups just before baking to maintain crispness of the phyllo shells
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coach the user on the critical importance of removing spinach moisture and timing the assembly and baking for maximum crispness and presentation.
